data.eml:eml: A second species of Araucariocladus Silveira & Mermudes, with notes on the variation in antennomere numbers in this genus (Coleoptera: Lampyridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nunes, V. C. S., Souto, P. M., Monteiro, R. F., Silveira, L. F. L. (2019): A second species of Araucariocladus Silveira & Mermudes, with notes on the variation in antennomere numbers in this genus (Coleoptera: Lampyridae). Zootaxa 4571 (4): 562-570, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4571.4.8
